mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select num, title, content, writer, regDate, views from tbl_board where num = #{num}
select num, title, writer, regDate, views from tbl_board order by num desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select num, title, writer, regDate, views from tbl_board
WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE writer LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by num desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
